articles.content: NewsAlong with an undisclosed sum, New Zealand will play extra games when the two sides meet in Pakistan next year

articles.title: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Rangers - Football Match Report - May 19, 2022 - ESPN India
articles.description: Get a report of the Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Rangers 2021-22 UEFA Europa League, Final football match.
articles.content:
Eintracht Frankfurt beat Rangers 5-4 on penalties on Wednesday in Seville to win the Europa League title and claim their first European trophy in 42 years.

articles.author: Shashank Kishore
articles.title: VVS Laxman to coach India on Ireland tour - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He will fill in for head coach Rahul Dravid who will instead assist India's prep in England
articles.content: VVS Laxman was in charge of the India Under-19 side that won the World Cup earlier this year  •  ICC/Getty Images
